content: For release on delivery  12:20 a.m. EDT (1:20 p.m. JST)  October 14, 2012      U.S. Monetary Policy and International Implications    Remarks by     Ben S. Bernanke     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     “Challenges of the Global Financial System:  Risks and Governance under Evolving Globalization”     A High-Level Seminar sponsored by   Bank of Japan-International Monetary Fund       Tokyo, Japan                 October 14, 2012
